disp-quote.p: “Everyone wants [the vaccine]. And according to the criteria, only those who were in contact with the suspected cases. And it’s a procedure to verify the veracity of the claims of someone who is asking for the vaccine.” (doctor, ID#01)

“We informed the health authorities of [city]… but no one answered the phone. Finally, having informed the team, they told us that they would come the next day. Because of the security risk, no travel at night. The body stayed at the health centre without an equipped morgue.” (doctor, ID#11)
